Text:
Do not post video rips in the Movies DVDR category.
That category is only for complete DVD images.
I have moved your torrent posting into Movies.

Also, as you will notice, putting BBcodes (you used [img]), in the torrent description, does not work, and just leaves you with URLs that people can not click on.

this is not ong bak 

this is warrior king AKA tom yum goong
